dmca.title: [Ticket#2007031610001281] DMCA Complaint from Sony for infinitycameras.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2007 2:54 PM
To: Response, Legal
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Sony for infinitycameras.com

To Whom It May Concern: 

Thank you for removing all of Sony Camcorders logos and copyrighted images from the
URL's provided, but in order to comply fully all of the copyrighted images and/or
trademarked logos of Sony Camcorder needs to be removed from your entire website.
This case will remain open until this request is satisfied in full.  If you should
need any further assistance in reaching compliance please let me know and I will do
my best to provide you with the needed information.  I have pasted all infringing
URL's below.

http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8377--Sony-HDR-FX7-HDV-CAMCORDER
    Text under the specifications tab
http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-4449--SONY-DCR-VX2100-Camcorder 
    images in the accessories
http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8338--Sony-HDR-UX1-HD-AVC-DVD-Camcorder 
  images in the accessories
http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-5440--Sony-HDR-FX1-HDV-Camcorder
          images in the accessories
http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8400-ac-Sony-HDR-SR1-HD-Handycam%2CCamcorder
     Text under the specifications tab

http://infinitycameras.com/display.php?catId=671&ix=1&brnd=Sony

http://infinitycameras.com/display.php?catId=671&brnd=Sony


 
Thanks in advance for your attention to this matter,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 02, 2007 12:19 PM
To: Barbara Davis; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Sony for infinitycameras.com

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your below-pasted
complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------


From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com]

Sent: Tuesday, March 20, 2007 9:57 AM
To: Response, Legal
Subject: FW:
[Ticket#2007031610001281] DMCA Complaint from Sony for infinitycameras.com

To
Whom It May Concern:

Thank you for removing all of Sony Camcorder logos and
copyrighted images from the URL's provided, but in order to comply fully all of
the copyrighted images and/or trademarked logos of Sony Camcorder needs to be
removed from your entire website. This case will remain open until this request
is satisfied in full. If you should need any further assistance in reaching
compliance please let me know and I will do my best to provide you with the
needed information. I have pasted all infringing URL's
below.

http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-7975--Sony-DCR-DVD505-DVD-Handycam-C
amcorder

http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8405--Sony-DCR-HC26%2C-MiniDV-Hand
ycam-Camcorder

http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8406--Sony-DCR-SR40-Handycam
-Digital-Camcorder

http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8407--Sony-DCR-SR60-Hand
ycam-Camcorder

http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8196--Sony-DCR-SR80-Handycam
-Camcorder

http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8404--Sony-DCR-HC36%2C-Mini-DV-C
amcorder

http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8377--Sony-HDR-FX7-HDV-CAMCORDER


http://infinitycameras.com/viewitem-4449--SONY-DCR-VX2100-Camcorder

http://infi
nitycameras.com/viewitem-8338--Sony-HDR-UX1-HD-AVC-DVD-Camcorder

http://infinit
ycameras.com/viewitem-5440--Sony-HDR-FX1-HDV-Camcorder

http://infinitycameras.c
om/viewitem-7970--Sony-DCR-HC96-MiniDV-Handycam-Camcorder

http://infinitycamera
s.com/viewitem-7971--Sony-DCR-DVD105-DVD-Handycam-Camcorder

http://infinitycame
ras.com/viewitem-7972--Sony-DCR-DVD205-DVD-Handycam-Camcorder

http://infinityca
meras.com/viewitem-7973--Sony-DCR-DVD305-DVD-Handycam-Camcorder

http://infinity
cameras.com/viewitem-7974--Sony-DCR-DVD405-DVD-Handycam-Camcorder

http://infini
tycameras.com/viewitem-7969--Sony-Sony-DCR-HC46-MiniDV-Handycam-Camcorder

http:
//infinitycameras.com/viewitem-8400--Sony-HDR-SR1-HD-Handycam%2CCamcorder

http://infinitycame

Thanks in advance for
your attention to this matter,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers
Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com

The
Online Enforcement Specialists......
